alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 3:35PM EST until January 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Near whiteout conditions with less than a half mile visibility expected at times. * WHERE...In Indiana, Eastern St. Joseph IN County. In Michigan, Northern Berrien County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lake effect snow bands are expected to meander across this area this evening and tonight lowering totals some, but wherever it does lie, hazardous driving conditions will be possible. Intense snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will be possible within dominant lake effect snow bands. Due to the nature of lake effect snow, conditions can vary significantly over very short distances, going from just flurries to whiteout conditions over the span of just a few miles. This can also result in highly variable snowfall totals over short distances.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
